Docs.summary: Targets that we will build in the project. This may mean different things for different project types, our tasks will put something like Rebuild, Clean, etc. here. This may be null if the project is being built with the default target.
Docs.value: The names of the targets being built in the external project. This can be a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the external project is being built with the default target.
